answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I looked into some information about Human Resources Auditing for you and have found a few places you may be able to look for more help. 
First, the link below is to an HR Audit for Orange County, Calif. completed by an ICMA member.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302630/Performance_Audit_of_the_Human_Resources_Department_of_Orange_County_California
Below is a link to some general information about Roanoke, Va.’s 2004 internal audit.
http://www.roanokeva.gov/DeptApps/AuditReports.nsf/645BC4B2AF064B3885256F8D00527CAD/$file/Survey+HR+Audit+12-20-04.pdf?openelement
Also, the website of the Association of Local Government Auditors and an HR Outsourcing Guide from TBM Pay Roll might be good for some general information on government auditing and good starting point for your search.
http://www.governmentauditors.org/index.php/about-alga
http://www.tbmpayroll.com/PDFs/TBM_HR_Outsourcing_guide_final.pdf
Does anyone else have experience with outsourcing an audit of Human Resources?
Ali Iannolo
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
